evidence.claim: Ethos Home Health Care adheres to HIPAA regulations to ensure patient data security.
The company integrates FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Ethos utilizes HIPAA-compliant systems for electronic health records.
Their technology enables seamless EHR integration adhering to HIPAA guidelines.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on public site.
